useful_fragments: "Volk ohne Raum" ( English: "people without space") was a political slogan used in the Weimar Republic and Nazi Germany.
The German concept of (, "living space") comprises policies and practices of settler colonialism which proliferated in Germany from the 1890s to the 1940s.
